name: Asylum (Early Access)
description:
ASYLUM takes you on a vivid experience into the depths of horror. You are an investigator, trying to report of the strange disappearances. However, you embark deeper and deeper, finding more than just a couple of bodies. Be ready to embrace the journey to Hell itself.
